title: Mimo
description: Full time working on the Mimo Android App.

title: Freeletics
description: Working in a feature team, implement cross-device user settings, set up a cloud test environment, take care of offline workout synchronization, implement a discount campaign for a Google featuring (Play Store featuring).

title: Salzburger Banken Software (SBS)
description: Writing an app for live monitoring events of ATMs, Firebase Cloud Messaging was used to communicate between the server and the smartphone. SBS software runs on 55% of all austrian and on 20% of all german ATMs (www.sbs.co.at).
